alert.note: Alert for Northern Ventura County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 06 at 6:20AM PST until January 07 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Light to moderate snow is expected, combined with damaging northwest to north winds. Snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches are expected above 4500 feet, with accumulations of 1 to 2 inches above 3500 feet. Northwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts to 60 to 70 mph are expected tonight and Sunday morning. * WHERE...Northern Ventura County Mountains. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 10 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult due to low visibilities and snow covered roads. Very strong winds may cause extensive tree damage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Once the snow ends, winds will remain strong to damaging, so a High Wind Warning will likely be needed.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions from CalTrans are available by calling 1 800 4 2 7 7 6 2 3.
